postData.title: Flash crDroid ROM for Redmi Note 7
postData.markdownContentSource:
1. You need to have a Xiaomi account that has been given permission for unlocking device.
1. Download MiFlash from https://www.miui.com/unlock/index.html
1. Download the crDroid ROM for Redmi Note 7 https://crdroid.net/lavender/9
1. Download firmware update from [1]
1. Download NikGapps from https://sourceforge.net/projects/nikgapps/files/Releases/NikGapps-T/. Core variant is enough.
1. Download OrangeFox recovery for Redmi Note 7 https://orangefox.download/en/device/lavender
   * crDroid version 9.8 introduce dynamic partition. We need to use OrangeFox because is the one that support dynamic partition since https://orangefox.download/release/64e67545531cf4e269b8aaa3.
1. Download Magisk from https://github.com/topjohnwu/Magisk/releases
1. Connect the phone to your laptop and open MiFlash to unlock your device following the instruction.
1. Reboot into bootloader mode
1. Execute the command to detect your device `fastboot.exe devices`
1. Flash OrangeFox recovery from bootloader with `fastboot.exe flash recovery recovery.img`
1. Reboot into recovery mode `fastboot.exe reboot`
1. Wipe Dalvik, cache, system, vendor from recovery
1. Copy the downloaded files to your phone in recovery mode
1. Flash firmware update from recovery
1. Flash `crDroid` from recovery
1. Reboot into system once and reboot again into recovery
1. Flash `NikGapps` from recovery
1. Boot into system
1. Install `Magisk-XX.apk`
1. Follow this instruction to complete `Magisk` installation https://topjohnwu.github.io/Magisk/install.html
1. Install `F-Droid`
1. Install `Aurora Store` from `F-Droid`
1. Install `Gboard`
1. Install `Chrome` from `Aurora Store`
1. Install 腾讯应用宝 from `Chrome`
